variants.Description in input context: This variant, c.1985T>A (p.L662Q), affects the protein structure and function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293T cell line transfected with CNTNAP2 plasmids.

Readout description.Result Description: The protein expression level of the variant NM_021675.3:c.1985T>A was reduced by 40% compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type CNTNAP2 plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA with Dunnett's post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression level greater than 80% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression level less than 60% compared to wild-type.
